title: job
description: A job posting by a user. Every job has 1 of 3 statuses: posted, active, completed

clientID.description: identifier of the client who posted the job

freelancerID.description: identifier of freelancer who worked/is working on job. (only required if status == active/complete)

price.description: the amount that the client will pay the freelancer

skills.description: the skills the client is looking for the freelancer to have

paymentTypes.description: the list of payment types client is willing to payout

status.description: the status of the job (posted/applied, active, complete)
